title: Left game - start a new one?!?
body:
I queued up for a ranked game today, picked my champ, got into the loading screen and entered summoners rift.
After something around 4 minutes, it was the first actual fight on the botlane. I got the message that my connection was broken, the typical attempting to reconnect. After I checked my internet connection and I saw that everything was alright, I decided to restart my game. So I pressed exit the game and waited for the 5 seconds to pass by. But as I left the game the client didnt load. So I used my taskmanager to close the game. It worked and started it again and logged in. 
...
But I didnt get the normal reconnect button. It seemed like the game was finished already. But I didnt find the game in my match history. It seemed like it just disappeared.
Does somebody know what happened there?

replies.body: I just had the same thing happen. Guy didn't load into game, then my client crashed. rejoined at 2 min mark and there was a defeat message and i got penalised for "afking" even though I was in at start of game and only absent <1 minute.  EAD Riot.

Hey there,

Games may occasionally crash and then appear non-existent, this intentionally occurs when there is an issue server-side preventing the game from starting.
If it was still early in the game, your team probably surrendered an early vote.
